document_data.name: Basanicas Boat Rentals
document_data.mainbody: '''Basanicas Boat Rentals''' was a rental shop found in the southwestern corner of [[Nesmé]].
document_data.Description: The rental shop lent out boats to travelers for about 25 [[gp]], but required a 20 [[gp]] deposit. A huge sign was set above the door to the shop, and was carved into the shape of a [[longboat]], where the name was printed.
